a.content:
Just zip the two geometrics series and geometric sequence.

A_n = \frac 1 {2^n} = \left\{ \frac 1 2, \frac 1 4, \frac 1 8 \dots \right\}

B_n = \sum \frac 1 {2^n} = \left\{ \frac 1 2, \frac 3 4, \frac 7 8 \dots \right \}

Now the new sequence

C_n = \begin{cases} A_n &\text{if } n \text{ is odd} \\ B_n &\text{if } d \text{ is even} \end{cases}

Now it's got two subsequences that converges to each 0 and 1.

q.content: A sequence that does not contain 0 or 1 as a term but contains subsequences converging to each of these values.
